title: Dawnbringer Icon and Border
body: So if I buy the icon and border, does that mean there's a border in the loading screen when I play with the Dawnbringer riven skin?

replies.body: but the thing is that u need the skin wich the game never tells you before buying that why alot of ppl want refunds
Yep! Even if you don't get the skin during the event, as long as you unlock the border now, you'll have it forever whenever you play with the skin.
